Command.name: JavaScript
Command.label: Uniform all text fields
Command.tooltip: Uniform all text fields in current PDF form

Item.name: ScriptCode
Item.value: /* Fix all texts in current form */ var numTexts = 0; for (var i = 0; i < this.numFields; i++) { var name = this.getNthFieldName(i); var field = this.getField(name); if (field.type == "text") { field.textFont = "Helvetica"; field.multiline = true; field.alignment = "center"; field.textSize = 0; /* A value of zero means the largest point size that allows all text data to fit in the fieldâ€™s rectangle */ field.doNotScroll = true; numTexts ++; } } app.alert("Fixed " + numTexts + " Text fields.");
